item.title: Querying Google With R
item.description: If you have a blogÂ you may want to discover how your website is performing for given keywords on Google Search Engine. As we all know, this topic is not a trivial one. Problem is that the analogycal solution would be quite time-consuming, requiring you to search your website for every single keyword, on many many pages. Feeling this way? [caption id="attachment_273” align="aligncenter” width="300”] “Pain and fear, pain and fear for me” - Oliver Twist[/caption]
